import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {Serie} from './serie' import {serieData} from'./data' @Component({ selector: 'app-serie', templateUrl: './serie.component.html', styleUrls: ['./serie.component.css'] }) export class SerieComponent implements OnInit { series: Array=[]; getSeriesList(){ return serieData; } constructor() { } ngOnInit() { this.series=this.getSeriesList(); } }
